text: Hi! Does anyone have experience with offering other payment methods in Stripe other than credit card? We are using the Stripe connection from HubSpot Quotes. It just needs to be added according to Stripe to the payment page in the code. Example: <https://stripe.com/docs/payments/ideal/accept-a-payment?platform=web>
Is this a coded template or a legacy Drag and drop page builder template?

HubSpot basically stores all of your module data in a big JSON Object. So they will remember the content that was in them so long as they are living in the same structure as the previous template.

IE if you clone a template It will look exactly the same with all of the modules content still there. But if you “group” content in an additional wrapper. Or move a module from a static group to a flex column then you will lose all of it’s data and you will have to re enter it.
